name: Lead The Gargoyles Duels
description:
LEAD THE GARGOYLE DUELS !!

This game was originally created for the Let's Talk Game Design's Game Jam  (2022) Theme : "None "
Initial of the Game : "LTGD"

Use the spacebar and the DPad to move the stained glass windows and align them by color.

Be careful, some stained glass can't be moved !

Credits :
  • Programming and Game Design : Frelude
  • Graphics : Madélou (and family : Séli (7yo) and Leto (5yo))
